overview:
## Discussion

Set the value of this property to `true` to enable the search bar or `false` to disable it. An enabled search bar responds to user interactions; a disabled search bar ignores touch events and takes on a disabled appearance.

If the search bar is associated with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem] with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/SearchBarPlacement-swift.enum/inline], then the minimized (icon-only) [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar] won’t grow to the text field while [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar/isEnabled] is `false`.

The default value of this property is `true` for a newly created search bar. You can set the search bar’s initial enabled state in your storyboard file.

# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the search bar is in the enabled state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set the value of this property to `true` to enable the search bar or `false` to disable it. An enabled search bar responds to user interactions; a disabled search bar ignores touch events and takes on a disabled appearance.

If the search bar is associated with a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem] with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/SearchBarPlacement-swift.enum/inline], then the minimized (icon-only) [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar] won’t grow to the text field while [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchBar/isEnabled] is `false`.

The default value of this property is `true` for a newly created search bar. You can set the search bar’s initial enabled state in your storyboard file.

## Configuring the search bar

- **barTintColor**: The tint color to apply to the search bar background.
- **searchBarStyle**: A search bar style that specifies the search bar’s appearance.
- **UISearchBar.Style**: Specifies whether the search bar has a background.
- **tintColor**: The tint color to apply to key elements in the search bar.
- **isTranslucent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the search bar is translucent (true) or not (false).
- **barStyle**: A bar style that specifies the search bar’s appearance.
- **UIBarStyle**: Defines the stylistic appearance of different types of views.
